Hello, I'm Guru.

I'm a Product Designer focused on crafting user-centered experiences across scalable B2B and B2C systems. Currently, I'm pursuing my Master's degree in Human-Computer Interaction at Georgia Tech.

Recently, I was a Product Designer Intern at Salesforce and previously have designed products at Ignitus and Groceristar. I have also worked on projects sponsored by the Georgia Aquarium and the Atlanta Symphony Orchestra.
